content: विलोम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (मी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Inverted reverse, inverse, contrary, opposite. {@--2@} Produced in the reverse order. {@--3@} Backward. --मः {@--1@} Reverse order, inversion. {@--2@} A dog. {@--3@} A snake. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of Varuṇa. --मं A waterwheel, machine for raising water from a well.
